snippet: Friday at Bonnaroo was full of smart female singers and songwriters: gentle and raucous, poppy and strange, open-hearted and enigmatic, sometimes all at once.
abstract: Friday at Bonnaroo was full of smart female singers and songwriters: gentle and raucous, poppy and strange, open-hearted and enigmatic, sometimes all at once.

headline.main: Bonnaroo: An Afternoon of Smart Female Singers and Songwriters
